projects.title: Airplane Seat Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive Java-based management tool designed to streamline airline seat bookings. It features a robust seating grid, passenger data handling, and automated ticket generation with persistent file storage for transaction logging.
features: Developed a menu-driven console interface for real-time seat purchasing, cancellation, and searching.
Implemented a dynamic 2D array-based seating plan with ASCII visualization to track seat occupancy.
Engineered a robust input validation system to ensure correct seat selection (Rows A-D) and passenger data integrity.
Integrated automated file persistence to generate and save individual ticket receipts for every booking.

highlights.architecture: Modular Object-Oriented design with dedicated Person and Ticket classes for segregated data management.
highlights.visualization: Real-time console-based occupancy map providing instant feedback on available and booked seats.
highlights.dataManagement: Persistent logging system that records passenger details and sales revenue to local text files.

projects.title: Academic Progression Predictor
projects.description: A robust Python-based tool designed for academic institutions to automate student progression analysis. It validates credit data, classifies outcomes according to university regulations, and generates dynamic visual histograms for educator-level insight.
features: Developed a dual-mode interface (Student/Teacher) to accommodate both individual and bulk data entry.
Engineered a dynamic graphical histogram using Tkinter for real-time visualization of academic results.
Implemented automated input validation ensuring total credit compliance (120 credits) and proper data types.
Integrated persistent file storage to log results for historical auditing and long-term tracking.

highlights.architecture: Modular script design with segregated logic for validation, processing, and rendering.
highlights.visualization: Custom Tkinter-based Results Graph for instant data-driven academic analysis.
highlights.dataManagement: Automated local logging system for reliable academic record-keeping.
